title: Brasserie 2eme Art
description: Second branch of Brasserie Lola, this one opened 2016 on Rive Droit in the 2nd arrondissement, close to Etienne Marcel metro station. Its decor is contemporary and can accommodates around 40 inside and around 10 on the terrace. Serves vegan food all hours, and offers a set menu for lunch on weekdays. Sample dishes include pad thai, club sandwich, kebab, risotto, and bagel.
